Unable to open Pieces Core Services
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces

common_issues.title: Users unable to connect to Pieces Cloud due to unauthorized requests
common_issues.description: Multiple users report "unauthorized request" errors when accessing Pieces Cloud across different platforms (macOS, Windows). Issues range from initial connection failures during installation to persistent cloud access problems for paid users.  Browser extensions are also affected. Potential causes include network security software (e.g., Cortex XDR) and authentication issues with Pieces Core Services.

also no browser extension for pieces works like, none of them

related_issues.title: Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
related_issues.text:
Cannot connect to Authentication site during install of Pieces
### Checked for Existing Issues?

- [x] Yes, I have checked existing issues and cannot find one related to this.

### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

12.2.1

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I end up at this url:

https://pieces.app/authentication-error?sentry_id=00000000000000000000000000000000&os=917d9227-e6ca-45d6-ae1a-c6b76b70a5c1&platform=windows

Please note:  This is when I install Pieces as part of the UltraEdit 2025.0 install on my work VDI.
Our VDIs have Cortex XDR for security so this may be blocking it.  If so, I probably can't use Pieces at work.  I highly doubt they will open any ports for this.
Error generating summary: 404 Publisher Model `projects/pi3c3s-cloud-server/locations/us-east1/publishers/google/models/gemini-pro` was not found or your project does not have access to it. Please ensure you are using a valid model version. For more information, see: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions

recommendations: Investigate and resolve the root cause of the "unauthorized request" errors affecting Pieces Cloud access. This appears to be the most frequent and impactful issue across multiple platforms.
Check for potential conflicts with network security software like Cortex XDR, which has been identified as a possible factor in connectivity problems.
Review and improve the authentication process for Pieces Core Services, especially for initial setup and browser extension integration.

Provide more detailed troubleshooting steps or documentation for users experiencing cloud connectivity issues, including specific instructions for different operating systems and network configurations.
Prioritize communication with affected users, especially paid users, to acknowledge the issue and provide updates on progress towards a resolution.
